name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AIwingman - ChatGPT on every site LIFETIME

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamless integration of ChatGPT GPT-4 on every site [Lifetime Access]. Get real-time AI assistance, translations, summaries & more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing AIwingman - ChatGPT on every site, the revolutionary Chrome extension that brings the power of ChatGPT to every site you browse! Enhance your online experience, boost productivity, and unleash the full potential of AI with seamless integration of OpenAI's powerful ChatGPT models like gpt-3.5-turbo, gpt4 and more.

Why should you install AIwingman?
1. Real-time AI assistance: Get auto-generated text, real-time translations, summaries, sentence completions, and rewrites at the click of a button.
2. Universal compatibility: AIwingman works on every site, making your browsing smarter and more efficient on platforms like LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, and more.
3. Easy to use: AIwingman monitors textboxes and displays handy buttons in the bottom right corner, making AI functionalities just a click away.
4. Customizable AI models: Upon installation, you can choose and save your preferred ChatGPT AI models and API key, tailoring the extension to your needs.

AIwingman's incredible features: 
🔹 Access ChatGPT / GPT-4 without leaving your favorite site
🔹 Translate content into multiple languages 🌍
🔹 Complete sentences with a natural flow 🖊️
🔹 Rewrite text for clarity, professionalism & error-free content ✨
🔹 Summarize posts/articles in a snap 📄
🔹 Use ai: prompt; for instant AI assistance 🧠 

Experience a smarter, more efficient browsing experience with AIwingman—a Chrome extension that makes the power of ChatGPT AI accessible on any website. Don't let the internet hold you back; let AIwingman be your ultimate browsing companion. Install AIwingman today and revolutionize the way you browse the internet!
